answer: At Retirement /Exit , you can withdraw a maximum of ₹Rs. $i /- (i.e 60% of the total maturity amount ).
You have to invest the remaining ₹ $j /- to purchase the pension fund.
After Retirement / Exit , you will get monthly Pension of ₹ @ 0.01 * j * r * 0.083334 @ /- throughout your life .
At the end of your life , the pension deposit amount $j /- will be given back to your nominees.
